resources.string:
Great Western Hike With Yaman 
• Date- 20th of October 2018 
• Location - Great Western Mountain Range 
• Duration- 01 days 
• Type of Activities-Jungle Trekking, Mountaineering


Expedition Goal : 
* Great Western Hike


- Activities- 
* Mountaineering 
* Trekking


Challengers: 
* Hard Jungle Trekking 
* Wet Forest 
* Team Work


Total Payment: 2800 LKR for per person


Cost includes: 
* Adventure Program with YAMAN Adventure Team 
* Safety Introduction and Method 
* Up and down Transportation to Location (A/C ) 
* 01 Main Meals (Lunch) 
* Refreshments 
* Full event photography (soft copy)


Responsibility and Yaman


We are the leading tour management team of Extremely Adventure Sporting and Adventure Travelling in Sri Lanka, as our 03 years Wild and Adventure experience with the Professional knowledge we have Succeed many Different Kind of Adventure And Traveling Events,


Special Remarks: 
*This Event Offer from Yaman for Adventure Lovers 
*Hurry up only for Limited Participation Only 18 Members can be join 
*Read Event Description carefully and Contact us for more info; 
* Please note that a Non-Refundable full of payment of 2800 LKR should be made on or before 10th of October to confirm your participation. 
*Please inbox us your contact details in order to receive Bank details and event procedure. 
*Participants will have to be present at 20th of October in Colombo at 02.00 am (in-front of Fort Railway Station)


For more info call us: 
✆Mayura - +94771193610 
✆Shani - +94719508969 
Or Leave Us Message To Yaman Official Facebook Page
